test.doc: Test the API endpoint that returns a list of products

test.name: [Product API] Fetch product deatils list with limit

kw.name: When I recieve the default product list with a limit
kw.doc: Recieve default products list via /products API with limit parameter

kw.name: GET
kw.doc: Sends a GET request.
kw.msg: GET Request : url=http://localhost:80/products/?limit=5 path_url=/products/?limit=5 headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.31.0', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive'} body=None

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Strings
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to strings.

kw.name: Set Test Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current test.

kw.name: Get Length
kw.doc: Returns and logs the length of the given item as an integer.

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Numbers
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to real numbers.

kw.name: Then I verify that product list is not empty
Verify Product List Size
kw.doc: Confirm that the value of the "count" key matches the number of items in the "products" list.

kw.name: Get Length
kw.doc: Returns and logs the length of the given item as an integer.

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Numbers
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to real numbers.
